thread.title: Pervatech at Euromembrane Conference on Membrane Technology
thread.title_full: Pervatech at Euromembrane Conference on Membrane Technology

title: Pervatech at Euromembrane Conference on Membrane Technology
text:
Pervatech at Euromembrane Conference on Membrane Technology 09 September 2015 by Pervatech Print Email Company Details 
Pervatech is happy to announce that it is presenting at Euromembrane 2015, an inspiring conference about membrane technology. 
The Euromembrane conference brings together researchers from universities and industry for an intensive and inspiring exchange of knowledge in a broad range of membrane science and technology. 
Pervatech BV materials scientist Dr Martin Wolf held an oral presentation on 'New horizons in ceramic membrane pervaporation and gas separation.' Please download the full presentation to read further. Available Downloads
